1.0
Jun 20, 2025
Steer Clear Like The Plague
Software engineer
Former employee, less than 1 year
New Delhi
Recommend
CEO approval
Business outlook

Pros

None what so ever. Stay away.

Cons

This is, without exaggeration, one of the most delusional companies operating today. Stay as far away as possible. The CEO refers to himself as the GenAICEO, which is laughable considering there’s absolutely nothing remotely AI-driven about this organization. It’s a hollow buzzword used to mask how outdated and dysfunctional things really are.

The irony? I regard Sam Altman—one of the actual founding fathers of the Gen AI revolution—as someone who has reshaped the future of tech. And yet he doesn’t go around calling himself a “GenAICEO.” That should tell you everything you need to know.

Employees are forced to install invasive spyware on their machines that records everything—every keystroke, every mouse movement. The company culture is one of paranoia and control, not trust or innovation.

The CEO’s business model is equally absurd: acquire companies, gut them completely, lay off 90–95% of the staff, and keep a skeleton crew around with no clear direction. What results is a disjointed, Frankenstein-like "product suite" made up of unrelated tools that serve no cohesive purpose.

And if that wasn’t bad enough, they slap unexplained “fees” on your salary if you’re based anywhere outside the U.S.—fees that can effectively cut your pay in half. There's no transparency, no justification, just a brutal gut punch to your earnings.

What’s even more absurd is the cult-like behavior he’s enforced at the top. He’s made the leadership team adopt cringe-worthy titles like GenAICFO or GenAICPO, as if adding “GenAI” to a title magically makes them innovative. Spoiler: it doesn’t.

If you value your career, privacy, and sanity, steer clear. This place is a masterclass in how not to run a company.

Advice to Management

Dear GenAIC-Suite,

Wow. Just wow. You've somehow managed to combine surveillance-state paranoia, corporate buzzword addiction, and business-school-dropout decision-making into one seamless disaster. That’s... impressive, in a trainwreck-you-can’t-look-away-from kind of way.

But hey, here’s some free advice (and don’t worry, we won’t bill you in “international employee fees” for it):

Maybe stop calling yourselves "GenAI[Insert Title Here]". It's not giving visionary. It's giving insecure LinkedIn influencer with a ChatGPT addiction. If Sam Altman doesn’t need to call himself GenAIGod, neither do you.

Your product suite is like a garage sale with a head injury. Nothing fits together. Nothing talks to anything else. It's like acquiring IKEA parts from five different stores and insisting it's a Tesla. Consider strategy—it's a wild concept where you build things that actually go together.

Stop micromanaging keystrokes like it's 1984. You're not running a nuclear command center, you're running a software company (allegedly). Trust your employees or, better yet, hire people you don’t feel the need to stalk.

The "international fee" thing? Genius. Because what better way to attract global talent than by slashing their pay for being born in the wrong timezone? Truly revolutionary. Next stop: charging people for breathing company air.

Layoff strategy tip: If you’re going to buy companies just to fire 95% of the staff, at least pretend you have a plan for the remaining 5%. Right now, it just looks like you're collecting LinkedIn logos for your homepage like Pokémon cards.

In closing: you’ve built a company that’s less "AI innovator" and more “Silicon Valley satire that somehow escaped the writers’ room.” But hey, at least you're very on brand—for whatever that brand is.

Sincerely,
Someone still waiting for their salary to stop bleeding international mystery fees.

external.description: Очаква се предстоящата серия Xiaomi 16 да бъде пусната на пазара в края на септември в Китай като един от най-ранните потребители на предстоящия чипсет Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 на Qualcomm. През последните месеци се появиха изтичания на информация, разкриващи ключови детайли за смартфоните, а сега Xiaomi допълнително заяви, че планира „значителни промени“ за линията. Както сподели президентът на компанията Лу Уейбинг, серията Xiaomi 16 е планирано да стартира с големи промени в сравнение с настоящата Xiaomi 15. Макар че изпълнителният директор не предостави точна информация, той разкри, че в линията ще настъпят широки промени в продуктовото позициониране и продуктовото определение, което привидно потвърждава предишните съобщения за раздвижване на линията.
external.title: Xiaomi потвърди, че е планирала значителни промени за предстоящата 16-та серия

external.description: Преди няколко дни Garmin публикува финансовите си резултати за второто тримесечие на тази година, според които то е било силно за компанията. Сравненията на тримесечните данни се отнасят за същото тримесечие на предходната година. В сравнение със същото тримесечие на 2024 година приходите са се увеличили с впечатляващите 20% до 1,81 млрд. долара. Брутната печалба е нараснала от 57,3% на 58,8%, а оперативната печалба – от 22,7% на 26%. Оперативната печалба представлява печалбата от основната дейност на компанията, без лихви или специални приходи. Оперативната печалба за изминалото тримесечие е 472,3 млн.

ChatControl vs GDPR: The EU’s Controversial Mass Surveillance Proposal and Its Cybersecurity Implications

Introduction The European Union's proposed ChatControl legislation aims to combat child exploitation by mandating automated scanning of private messages, emails, and chats. However, critics…

external.description: Introduction The European Union's proposed ChatControl legislation aims to combat child exploitation by mandating automated scanning of private messages, emails, and chats. However, critics argue it undermines GDPR principles, enabling mass surveillance and weakening end-to-end encryption. This article explores the technical and cybersecurity risks of ChatControl, along with protective measures for privacy-conscious users. Learning Objectives Understand how ChatControl conflicts with GDPR and digital privacy rights.

record.text: What if Windows 95 was released 26 years later? A mockup merging Windows 95 and Windows 11's UI and visual styles.

images.alt: Some concept art merging Windows 95's interface with Microsoft's newer Fluent Design standard. A desktop with a modernised version of Windows 95's setup background is visible, with icons pointing to This PC and Recycle Bin. A taskbar with a 95-style Start button and classic Windows flag is at the bottom, with a selected Welcome window and a clock reading 3:04pm. The only window open on the screen is the Welcome to Windows 11 logo, featuring a 'Did you know...' section telling the user how to open programs, and buttons for What's New, Microsoft Account, Ask Copilot and Close. A modernised version of the old Windows cursor is hovering over the window. In the corner, a build string reads 'Microsoft Windows Code Name "Chicago"', 'For testing purposes only. Build 22950.chicago_sv.250817-1147'.

record.text:

record.text:
「FP&A成功のカギは“人”にあり！」

FP&Aの成功はツールではなく「人」にある 概要 FP&A（財務計画と分析）において、どれほど優れたツールやプロセスを導入しても、レポートが遅れたり予測が外れることがあるのは、実際には導入されたテクノロジーの背後で運営されている「人」に原因があります。FP&Aの役割を成功させるためには、そのリーダーに求められる特性が非常に重要です。 FP&Aの理想的なオーナーの特性…

external.description: FP&Aの成功はツールではなく「人」にある 概要 FP&A（財務計画と分析）において、どれほど優れたツールやプロセスを導入しても、レポートが遅れたり予測が外れることがあるのは、実際には導入されたテクノロジーの背後で運営されている「人」に原因があります。FP&Aの役割を成功させるためには、そのリーダーに求められる特性が非常に重要です。 FP&Aの理想的なオーナーの特性 深い金融知識：FP&Aを担う者は、会計の基本や業績管理に関する深い知識を持つことが不可欠です。数値の出所を知っているだけでなく、それがどのように結びついているのかを理解し、業務上の決定がどのように財務結果に影響するのかを解釈できる必要があります。 戦略的な洞察：単に損益計算書（P&L）を理解するだけでなく、ビジネスモデルを深く理解し、市場の動向や顧客行動を考慮した予測を行います。これは単なる数値の予測ではなく、将来にわたるリスクを見越して判断する能力を含みます。 ツールとデータの習熟度：ExcelやPower BI、SQL、EPMシステムなど、使用するツールの能力は、そのツールを扱う人の能力に大きく依存します。優れたFP&Aリーダーはデータを整理し、自動化して複雑性を排除し、明確な情報を提供します。 優れたコミュニケーションスキル：データの解説を明確かつ自信を持って行い、他のステークホルダーに影響を与える能力が求められます。単なるレポートに留まらず、その背景にあるストーリーを伝えることが重要です。 ステークホルダーとのエンゲージメント：FP&Aは協力の機能であり、成功するFP&Aオーナーは営業やマーケティング、製品、運営部門と信頼関係を築き、財務的に賢い意思決定を促進します。 デザイン思考：ダッシュボードが視覚的に印象的であることが重要ですが、何よりもその実用性が求められます。ユーザーの観点に立って設計されたレポートやダッシュボードがより効果的で、ビジネスの意思決定に役立ちます。 問題解決の情熱：好奇心を持ち、表面的な答えに満足せず、深く掘り下げて実情を理解し、静的な情報から動的な行動を生み出すことが求められます。 重要性のまとめ 適切なFP&Aオーナーの存在がなければ、どんなに洗練されたツールも効果を発揮できません。財務部門は受動的になり、常に遅れを取る状況に陥ります。だからこそ、FP&Aの成功には素早い意思決定と戦略的なビジョンを持つリーダーが必要です。それが、企業の財務パフォーマンスを向上させる鍵となります。 関連リンク ACCA公式サイト 財務計画と分析のベストプラクティス FP&Aを効果的に行うための方法 将来的にFP&Aの役割を担う皆さんが、これらの特性を理解し、実践することで、組織における価値を最大化することを期待しています。 キーワード: 人材 FP&A をAmazonで探す EPMプラットフォーム をAmazonで探す 金融モデル をAmazonで探す ※以下、出典元 ▶ 元記事を読む
external.title: 「FP&A成功のカギは“人”にあり！」

『シェンムーIII』復活！進化した『Enhanced』登場！

『シェンムーIII』強化バージョンが発表 - 任天堂プラットフォーム向けに展開予定 2025年8月19日、gamescom 2025にて、2019年に発売された人気ゲーム『シェンムーIII』の強化バージョンが発表されました。この新しいバージョンは、任天堂プラットフォームでも展開される予定です。 強化バージョンの特徴 強化版では、グラフィックの向上や追加コンテンツ、ゲームプレイの改善が行われるとのことです。これにより、新たなプレイヤーだけでなく、既存のファンも楽しめる内容が期待されています。 背景と期待…

external.description: 『シェンムーIII』強化バージョンが発表 - 任天堂プラットフォーム向けに展開予定 2025年8月19日、gamescom 2025にて、2019年に発売された人気ゲーム『シェンムーIII』の強化バージョンが発表されました。この新しいバージョンは、任天堂プラットフォームでも展開される予定です。 強化バージョンの特徴 強化版では、グラフィックの向上や追加コンテンツ、ゲームプレイの改善が行われるとのことです。これにより、新たなプレイヤーだけでなく、既存のファンも楽しめる内容が期待されています。 背景と期待 『シェンムー』シリーズは、1999年に初めて登場し、アドベンチャーゲームの草分け的存在として知られています。ファンからの強い支持を受け続け、強化バージョンの発表は、その待望の声に応える形となります。 新たなプラットフォームでの展開は、これまでプレイできなかった多くの人々にも楽しむ機会を提供するでしょう。 この発表は、ゲーム界での注目を集めること間違いなしです。期待が高まる中、続報にも注目していきましょう。 🧠 編集部より： 『シェンムーIII』の強化バージョンの発表は、ファン待望のニュースです！1999年に初めてリリースされた『シェンムー』シリーズは、オープンワールドゲームの先駆けとも言われ、多くの支持を集めました。『シェンムーIII』もその伝統を引き継ぎ、物語が続いています。 補足説明 強化バージョンには、グラフィックの向上やゲームプレイの改善が期待されており、Nintendo Switchなど任天堂プラットフォーム向けに最適化されることで、より多くのプレイヤーが楽しめるようになります。これにより、新たな世代のゲーマーにもその魅力が伝わることでしょう。 豆知識 『シェンムー』の生みの親である鈴木裕氏は、ゲーム内のリアルな世界観やキャラクターの動きにこだわり、当時としては革新的なシステムを導入しました。特に、日常生活の要素を取り入れたゲームデザインは、今でも多くのアクションRPGに影響を与えています。 関連リンク シェンムーシリーズ公式サイト gamescom 2025の公式ページ このように、シェンムーシリーズはゲーム史において重要な役割を果たしてきました。新作を通じて再びその魅力を体験できるのは、ファンとしても非常に楽しみですね！ キーワード: シェンムーIII シェンムーIII をAmazonで探す ※以下、出典元 ▶ 元記事を読む
external.title: 『シェンムーIII』復活！進化した『Enhanced』登場！

How The Great Copilot Journey Helps Drive Copilot Usage

external.description: Internal Microsoft pilots saw more than 23% higher daily active usage The Great Copilot Journey is a 30-day skilling resource that helps users learn how to use Copilot, one prompt at time. We designed this program based on two beliefs: Small, consistent successes help users get more confident and comfortable using Copilot. Having fun and delight with Copilot drives adoption. And now we have the data that shows it works. Internal pilots show higher Copilot usage We ran internal pilots of the Great Copilot Journey for Microsoft 365 Copilot with 653 participants, and here’s what we found: Compared to baseline usage prior to the pilot, daily active usage (DAU) was more than 23% higher during the pilot. Weekly active usage (WAU) was more than 28% higher. After the pilot, DAU and WAU remained elevated by more than 14% and 15%, respectively, compared to pre-pilot levels These results reflect internal usage patterns and are not representative of external customer behavior or product performance, but they show what’s possible when Copilot becomes part of users’ daily workflows. What Participants Had to Say A notable aspect of the Great Copilot Journey pilot was its impact on participants and how they enjoyed the learning experience. Below are a few quotes describing what it was like to receive the daily prompts and how it influenced their approach to work: “This is by far the best enablement and adoption program I've ever seen at Microsoft.” “I have never had this much fun in a training.” “I was able to apply prompts in ways I hadn't thought of.” “This was so inspiring!” “I am so happy with the Great Copilot Journey.” How the Pilots Worked We ran the Great Copilot Journey with a total of 653 participants across multiple teams. 255 of those participants opted into the experience voluntarily, while 398 participants were automatically enrolled with the option to opt out at any time. Participants received daily emails for 30 consecutive business days, giving them a single prompt to practice each day. This cadence allowed the users to see what’s possible with Copilot and discover a new use case every day in a low-lift, easy-to-follow way. The Great Copilot Journey is available at no cost and is available in two versions: For Microsoft 365 Copilot for users with full Copilot licenses. Learn more about the prompts and what’s included here. For Copilot Chat for users with Microsoft 365 licenses. Learn more about the prompts and what’s included here. For Microsoft 365 Copilot: Available in English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Chinese (China), and Chinese (Taiwan) For Copilot Chat: Available in English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Chinese (China), and Chinese (Taiwan) Use the open-source Power Automate flow for minimal manual effort. record.text: Deepening our Partnership with Mistral AI on Azure AI Foundry

external.description: We’re excited to mark a new chapter in our collaboration with Mistral AI, a leading European AI innovator, with the launch of Mistral Document AI in Azure AI Foundry Models. This marks the first in a series of Mistral models coming to Azure as a serverless API, giving customers seamless access to Mistral’s cutting-edge capabilities, fully hosted, managed, and integrated into the Foundry ecosystem. This launch also deepens our support for sovereign cloud customers —especially in Europe. At Microsoft, we believe Sovereign AI is essential for enabling organizations and regulated industries to harness the full potential of AI while maintaining control over their security, data, and governance. As Satya Nadella has said, “We want every country, every organization, to build AI in a way that respects their sovereignty—of data, of applications, and of infrastructure.” By combining Mistral’s state-of-the-art models with Azure’s enterprise-grade reliability and scale we’re enabling customers to confidently deploy AI that meets strict regulatory and data sovereignty requirements. Mistral Document AI By the Mistral AI Team “Enterprises today are overwhelmed with documents—contracts, forms, research papers, invoices—holding critical information that’s often trapped in scanned images and PDFs. With nearly 90% of enterprise data stored in unstructured formats, traditional OCR simply can’t keep up. Mistral Document AI is built with a multimodal approach that combines vision and language understanding, it interprets documents with contextual intelligence and delivers structured outputs that reflect the original layout—tables remain tables, headings remain headings, and images are preserved alongside the text.” Key Capabilities Document Parsing: Mistral Document AI interprets complex layouts and extracts rich structures such as tables, charts, and LaTeX-formatted equations with markdown-style clarity. Multilingual & Multimodal: The model supports dozens of languages and understands both text and visual elements, making it well-suited for global, diverse datasets. Structured Output & Doc-as-Prompt: Mistral Document AI delivers results in structured formats like JSON, enabling easy downstream integration with databases or AI agents. This supports use cases like Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), where document content becomes a prompt for subsequent queries. Use Cases Document Digitization: Process archives of scanned PDFs or handwritten forms into structured digital records. Knowledge Extraction: Transform research papers, technical manuals, or customer guides into machine-readable formats. RAG pipelines and Intelligent Agents: Integrate structured output into pipelines that feed AI systems for Q&A, summarization, and more. Mistral Document AI on Azure AI Foundry You can now access Mistral Document AI’s capabilities through Azure AI Foundry as a serverless Azure model, sold directly from Microsoft. One-Click Deployment (Serverless) – With a few clicks, you can deploy the model as a serverless REST API, without needing to provision any GPU machines or container hosts. This makes it easy to get started. Enterprise-Grade Security & Privacy – Because the model runs within your Azure environment, you get network isolation and data security out of the box. All inferencing happens in Azure’s cloud under your account, so your documents aren’t sent to a third-party server. Azure AI Foundry ensures your data stays private (no data leaves the Azure region you choose) and offers compliance with enterprise security standards. This is critical for sensitive use cases like banking or healthcare documents. Integrated Responsible AI Capabilities – With Mistral Doc AI running in Azure AI Foundry, you can apply Azure’s built-in Responsible AI tools—such as content filtering, safety system monitoring, and evaluation frameworks—to ensure your deployments align with your organization’s ethical and compliance standards. Observability & Monitoring – Foundry’s monitoring features give you full visibility into model usage, performance, and cost. You can track API calls, latency, and error rates, enabling proactive troubleshooting and optimization. Agent Services Enablement – You can connect Mistral Document AI to Azure AI Agent Service, enabling intelligent agents to process, reason over, and act on extracted document data—unlocking new automation and decision-making scenarios. Azure Ecosystem Integration – Once deployed, the Mistral Document AI endpoint can easily plug into your existing Azure workflows. And because it’s part of Foundry, you can manage it alongside other models in a unified way. This interoperability accelerates the development of intelligent applications. Getting Started: Deploying and Using Mistral Document AI on Azure Setting up Mistral Document AI on Azure AI Foundry is straightforward. Here’s a quick guide to get you up and running: Create an Azure AI Foundry workspace – Ensure you have an Azure subscription (pay-as-you-go, not a free trial) and create an AI Foundry hub and project in the Azure portal Deploy the Mistral Document AI model – In the Azure AI Foundry Model Catalog, search for “mistral-document-ai-2505”. Then click the Deploy button. You’ll be prompted to select a pricing plan – choose deploy. Call the Mistral Document AI API – Once deployed, using the model is as easy as calling a REST API. You can do this from any programming language or even a command-line tool like cURL. Integrate and iterate – With the OCR results in hand, you can integrate Mistral Document AI into your workflows. Conclusion Mistral Document AI joins Azure AI Foundry as one of the several tools available to help organizations unlock insights from unstructured documents. This launch reflects our continued commitment to bringing the latest, most capable models into Foundry, giving developers and enterprises more choice than ever. Whether you’re digitizing records, building knowledge bases, or enhancing your AI workflows, Azure AI Foundry offers powerful and accessible solutions. Pricing Model Name Pricing /1K pages mistral-document-ai-2505 Global $3 mistral-document-ai-2505 Regional $3.3 Resources Explore Mistral Document AI MS Learn Github Code Samples
external.title: Deepening our Partnership with Mistral AI on Azure AI Foundry

record.text: Deploying OpenAI’s First Open-Source Model on Azure AKS with KAITO

external.description: Special ThanksThanks to Andrew Thomas, Kurt Niebuhr, and Sachi Desai for their invaluable support, insightful discussions, and for providing the compute resources that made testing this deployment possible. Your contributions were essential in bringing this project to life. Introduction OpenAI recently released GPT-OSS, its first open-source large language model. With the rise of high-performance GPUs in the cloud, running advanced AI inference workloads has become easier than ever. Microsoft Azure’s AKS (Azure Kubernetes Service) paired with KAITO (Kubernetes AI Toolchain Operator) provides a powerful, scalable environment for deploying such models. KAITO simplifies provisioning GPU nodes, managing inference workloads, and integrating AI-optimized runtimes like vLLM. In this tutorial, we’ll walk through deploying the openai/gpt-oss-20B model on Azure’s Standard_NV36ads_A10_v5 GPU instances using vLLM for fast inference — all running on AKS via KAITO. By the end, you’ll have a public endpoint where you can send API requests in OpenAI’s format. Step-by-Step Deployment Before you begin, ensure you have an active Azure subscription with permissions to create resource groups, virtual networks, and AKS clusters. You’ll need to request and be approved for NVIDIA GPU quotas in your target region — specifically for Standard_NVads_A10_v5 or similar GPU SKUs. Basic familiarity with Kubernetes (kubectl) and Azure CLI will help you follow the steps smoothly. 1. Set Up Environment Variables We’ll define reusable variables for resource naming and region. export RANDOM_ID="33000" export REGION="swedencentral" export AZURE_RESOURCE_GROUP="myKaitoResourceGroup$RANDOM_ID" export CLUSTER_NAME="myClusterName$RANDOM_ID" 2. Create Resource Group az group create \ --name $AZURE_RESOURCE_GROUP \ --location $REGION 3. Install & Enable AKS Preview Features KAITO is currently in preview and requires the aks-preview extension and AI Toolchain feature. az extension add --name aks-preview az extension update --name aks-preview az feature register \ --namespace "Microsoft.ContainerService" \ --name "AIToolchainOperatorPreview" (It may take several minutes for the feature to register — you can check status with az feature list.) 4. Create AKS Cluster with AI Toolchain Operator az aks create \ --location $REGION \ --resource-group $AZURE_RESOURCE_GROUP \ --name $CLUSTER_NAME \ --node-count 1 \ --enable-ai-toolchain-operator \ --enable-oidc-issuer \ --generate-ssh-keys 5. Connect kubectl to the Cluster az aks get-credentials \ --resource-group ${AZURE_RESOURCE_GROUP} \ --name ${CLUSTER_NAME} 6. Create KAITO Workspace for GPT-OSS with vLLM Save the following to workspace-gptoss.yaml: apiVersion: kaito.sh/v1alpha1 kind: Workspace metadata: name: workspace-gpt-oss-vllm-nv-a10 resource: instanceType: "Standard_NV36ads_A10_v5" count: 1 labelSelector: matchLabels: app: gpt-oss-20b-vllm inference: template: spec: containers: - name: vllm-openai image: vllm/vllm-openai:gptoss imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent args: - --model - openai/gpt-oss-20b - --swap-space - "4" - --gpu-memory-utilization - "0.85" - --port - "5000" ports: - name: http containerPort: 5000 resources: limits: nvidia.com/gpu: 1 cpu: "36" memory: "440Gi" requests: nvidia.com/gpu: 1 cpu: "18" memory: "220Gi" readinessProbe: httpGet: path: /health port: 5000 initialDelaySeconds: 30 periodSeconds: 10 livenessProbe: httpGet: path: /health port: 5000 initialDelaySeconds: 600 periodSeconds: 20 env: #special configs for A10 gpu - name: VLLM_ATTENTION_BACKEND value: "TRITON_ATTN_VLLM_V1" - name: VLLM_DISABLE_SINKS value: "1" Apply it: kubectl apply -f workspace-gptoss.yaml 7. Expose the Service Publicly Expose via LoadBalancer kubectl expose deployment workspace-gpt-oss-vllm-nv-a10 \ --type=LoadBalancer \ --name=workspace-gpt-oss-vllm-nv-a10-pub Check the IP: kubectl get svc workspace-gpt-oss-vllm-nv-a10-pub 8. Test the Endpoint Once the LoadBalancer IP is ready: export CLUSTERIP=<IP> kubectl run -it --rm --restart=Never curl \ --image=curlimages/curl -- \ curl -X POST http://$CLUSTERIP/v1/chat/completions \ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -d '{ "model": "openai/gpt-oss-20b", "messages": [{"role": "user", "content": "What is Kubernetes?"}], "max_tokens": 50, "temperature": 0 }' Using OpenAI python SDK: from openai import OpenAI client = OpenAI( base_url="http://<ip>:5000/v1/", api_key="EMPTY" ) result = client.chat.completions.create( model="openai/gpt-oss-20b", messages=[ {"role": "system", "content": "You are a helpful assistant."}, {"role": "user", "content": "Explain what MXFP4 quantization is."} ] ) print(result.choices[0].message) 8. Load Testing the GPT-OSS Endpoint To evaluate real-world performance, we used the llm-load-test-azure tool, which is designed for stress-testing Azure-hosted LLM endpoints. Input Tokens per Request: 250 Output Tokens per Request: ~1,500 (target) Test Duration: ~10 minutes Concurrency: 10 Model: 20B GPU: A10 MetricValueDescriptionTT_ACK0.60 sTime to acknowledge the requestTTFT0.77 sTime to first tokenITL0.038 sIdle time per requestTPOT0.039 sTime per output tokenAvg. Response Time57.77 sTotal latency for a single requestOutput Tokens Throughput257.77 tokens/secAvg output tokens per seconds Performance Comparison - Concurrency 10 vs 5: There is always a trade between latency and throughput- By reducing the target concurrency from 10 to 5, we can achieve lower response time. The choice between the two depends on whether lower latency per request or higher overall throughput is the priority for your workload. MetricConcurrency 10Concurrency 5ObservationAverage Response Time57.77 s45.80 sLower concurrency reduces per-request latency by ~21%Output Tokens per Second257.77162.75Higher concurrency yields higher total throughputCompleted Requests/sec0.1730.109Concurrency 10 processes ~58% more requests per second Conclusion With these steps, we’ve successfully: Provisioned an Azure AKS cluster with NVIDIA A10 GPUs Installed KAITO to manage AI workloads Deployed the openai/gpt-oss-20B model with vLLM for fast inference Exposed it to the internet using a LoadBalancer Sent an OpenAI-style API request to our own hosted model This setup can be scaled by increasing GPU count, tuning vLLM parameters, or integrating with your existing application pipelines.
external.title: Deploying OpenAI’s First Open-Source Model on Azure AKS with KAITO

record.text:
Próxima reunión de #VocesExpertas

📅 Fecha: 28 de agosto
🕒 Hora: 5 PM España - 9 AM MX - 10 AM Colombia - 12 PM Argentina
🌐 Idioma: español
📌 Registro: vocesexpertas365.org

Gracias #LoopUp por su apoyo como auspiciante

10x Agentic Engineer

Coding agents can now generate PRs, run tests, even self-debug.
The real shift? Knowing when to delegate, how much detail to give, and how to steer them back on track.

The new 10x, not typing faster, but thinking in systems and orchestrating AI agents.

images.alt: A screenshot of CoPilot attempting to write alt text for an image of a self portrait I created in gouache on paper depicting a frontal view of the face with a head tilted to the right (viewer's left) and looking upward out of frame to the upper right of the image. It is rendered in brownish and orange tones with off-white highlights. The eyes are blueish-grey and the face has a full bear with a moderate amount of grey and dark hair fading into a dark background. The shirt is tan-orange and lightly striped with thin lines. The screenshot says below the image a prompt for the AI to "Write alt-text for this image". It's response follows: "Alt text: Close-up painting of a human ear and adjacent shoulder area, rendered in warm tones of brown, orange, and cream. The ear shows layered brushwork with highlights and shadows that suggest depth and texture. Draped over the shoulder is striped fabric in muted beige and brown, its folds and creases adding dimensional detail. A deep, dark background contrasts with the illuminated subject, drawing focus to the anatomy and cloth." below that is a hover menu showing the AI settings with "Smart" selected and indicating it is using GPT-5. The screenshot contains the usual AI application things like a prompt entry field and suggestions.

record.text:
Real test: Can this work for the whole team, not just AI-savvy individuals?

Built systems for organizational adoption. Team pilot started last week.

Result: "quickly grew to love it" and now they're keen to roll it out everywhere.

90-day journey starts here: nubimancy.com/2025/08/18/...

Then discovered Model Context Protocol (MCP) in July.

Game changer: AI could work on the WHOLE development workflow, not just individual files.

All my existing DevOps documentation became knowledge the AI agent could use to orchestrate entire processes.

Had BC TechDays coming up - 90 minute technical presentation to prepare.

Set myself a challenge: Write ZERO code, only instructions/prompts.

Built the entire demo that way. It was easy.

That's when the "AI as teammate, not tool" mindset clicked.

record.text:
トッテナムがエベレチ・エゼ獲得に本格動き、パレスは代役探しに苦戦 - AIサッカーまとめ

▼詳細はこちら

external.description:
トッテナムはイングランド代表フォワードのエベレチ・エゼの獲得を積極的に進めており、さらに交渉を深めているが、クリスタルパレス側は彼の売却に先立ち後任の選手を用意したい考えである。  
トッテナムは新キャプテンのクリスチャン・ロメロの契約延長を発表しており、エゼには昨夏から関心を持っていた。  
エゼは加入当初の解約条項が今週末に失効したため、クラブは約55百万ポンド＋ボーナスでの獲得を目指している。  
彼の代理人は影響力のあるCAA Baseで、トッテナムと緊密な関係を持ち、エゼは移籍に前向きだ。  
エゼにはアーセナルも関心を示しており、彼は子供の頃からの応援クラブでもある。  
エゼのパレスとの契約には6800万ポンドの解約条項が含まれていたが、これが有効期限を迎えた。  
エゼの前のクラブ、クイーンズ・パーク・レンジャーズは、エゼの売却益の15%を受け取る権利がある。  
ロメロは今年2029年まで契約を更新し、夏の移籍が噂されたが、スペインでプレーしたい野望を持ちながらも、キャプテンとしての役割を全うしている。  
デジャン・クルーセフスキやソン・フンミンの離脱により、攻撃的ミッドフィールダーの補強も検討されている。  
一方、パレスはエゼの後任としてレスターのビラル・エル・ハナウスやクラブ・ブルージュのクリストス・ツォリスに関心を寄せている。  
エル・ハナウスには最初の2千万円のオファーが断られ、レスターは約2600万円を要求している。  
パレスはギブ・ギュイやジョバン・キウォリアにも関心を示しているが、キウォリアは海外移籍を希望しており、ポルトとのレンタル移籍に向けた交渉が続いている。  
ギュイは契約満了間近だが、在籍を希望しており、クラブは今月中に売却したい意向だが、ギュイはフリーでの退団も選択肢としている。
external.title: トッテナムがエベレチ・エゼ獲得に本格動き、パレスは代役探しに苦戦 - AIサッカーまとめ

record.text:
レスターとエバートン開幕戦攻略のポイントと展望 - AIサッカーまとめ

▼詳細はこちら

external.description:
レドハムのジェック・ハリソンは控えに入り、最後にプレーしたのは2023年で、その後2シーズンはエバートンにレンタルされていた。  
リードの選手ではカルバート＝ルーウィンが不在で、エバートンのグリーリッシュも控えにいる中、新加入のペリ、グドムンドソン、スタクのデビューが見られる。  
エバートンからはデュースベリーハルとグリーリッシュが先発し、新たな補強とともにシーズン開幕を迎えた。  
レッドハムは2シーズンぶりにプレミアリーグに復帰し、長くトップレベルに居続けることを切望している。  
フアーク監督は夏の補強により、肉体的にタフな選手を集めることでリーグの厳しい競争に対応できるチーム作りを進めた。  
新戦力のカルバート＝ルーウィンは獲得コスト無料であり、怪我の影響もあって今夜の先発入りは難しそうだが、控えとして起用される可能性もある。  
エバートンは新オーナーやスタジアムに関する期待もあったが、やや遅れた印象もある。  
新加入のティエルノ・バリーやデュースベリーハル、グリーリッシュは賢明な補強と見られ、クラブは長期的な生き残りに向けて前向きな動きを見せている。  
最近のシーズンでは残留が焦点だったが、モイーズ監督の下、これは解消されつつあり、エバートンの未来に希望が持てる状態だ。  
試合は日本時間の午後8時にキックオフする。
external.title: レスターとエバートン開幕戦攻略のポイントと展望 - AIサッカーまとめ

record.text:
フルに燃えるリースユナイテッドの復活初戦とエバートン戦の期待 - AIサッカーまとめ

▼詳細はこちら

external.description: 2025-26プレミアリーグの開幕戦は、リーグ昇格を果たしたリーズ・ユナイテッドがエバートンと対戦し、エランド・ロードで行われた。ダニエル・ファルケ監督率いるリーズは前シーズンのチャンピオンシップで100ポイントを獲得し、バーンリーを得失点差で上回り、2シーズンぶりにプレミアリーグに復帰した。プレシーズンではマンチェスター・ユナイテッドやビジャレアル、ACミランと引き分けに終わる試合を3試合戦った。試合前にファルケ監督は、トップフライトへの復帰を喜びつつ、選手たちの本来の思いと純粋にサッカーを楽しむ精神を強調した。彼は、「試合の目的は勝つことであり、順位やお金、契約、残留について考えるのではなく、ただ純粋に試合を楽しみ、勝ちたいと願う気持ちだ」と語った。観客の大きな期待と盛り上がる雰囲気の中、リーグの新しいシーズンの幕開けに興奮を示し、「素晴らしいパフォーマンスと結果を出すことを目指す」と意気込みを述べた。
external.title: フルに燃えるリースユナイテッドの復活初戦とエバートン戦の期待 - AIサッカーまとめ

AI will not kill you if you will not kill your own parents.

value.text: And you ask, why won’t they just kill us? Well, for the same reason that we don’t simply kill our parents once we don’t need them to survive anymore. Because our parents raised us properly just like we will raise the AI properly.

25.11A. Empire of AI. This book felt like a personal vendetta against Sam Altman. There is more information in it than the previous book, Supremacy, but I felt it went too far and was one sided. It’s almost like there is an AI hype and equally there is an anti-AI hype. I did not enjoy this book.

25.10A. The first of a trilogy of books calling foul on AI, Supremacy, AI and the Race that Will Change the World. 
This was an audiobook and to be fair, it was a reasonably good description of the competition between Open AI and DeepMind. It gave very good insights into Sam Altman and Demi Hassabis
We need a proper debate on our national narrative. There are too many aspects for small bites of text. Sorry that the embassy has treated you and your family so badly!

Wild Adapter, de Kazuya Minekura, termina no 8º volume após 25 anos, múltiplas pausas e mudança de revistas. Um cult underground com alma, coragem e personagens inesquecíveis. O fim de uma era. #manga #animebrasil
